Geas/Quest (Ch6 Ench): R65' Target must complete task
Heal (Healer7 Conj): Touched heals (undead suffers) 150 HP and removes negative conditions

Lesser Restoration (Healer2 Conj): Dispels magical ability harm from touched or heals 1d4 temporary ability damage, removes fatigue, and reduces exhaustion
Mass Cure Light Wounds (Healer5 Conj): R65' 16 targets in 15' radius heal (undead suffer) 1d8+16 HP (DC 16 Will half)

Modify Memory (Ch4 Ench): R65' Changes 5 min of target's memory (DC 13 Will neg)
Neutralize Poison (Healer3 Conj): Touched neutralized 160 min, immunized, or detoxified
Nightmare (Ch5 Illu): Target suffers 1d10 HP and fatigue (DC 14 Will neg (modified for familiarity w/target))
Pass Without Trace (D1 Tran): 16 touched leave no tracks or scent for 16 hr
Power Word Blind (Ch7 Ench): R65' Target w/ 1/51/101/201 HP blinded for ever/1d4+1 min/1d4+1 rd/unaffected
Prestidigitation (Ch0 Evoc): R10' Self performs minor tricks for 1 hr
Raise Dead (Healer5 Conj): Restores willing soul, dead up to 16 dy, to its touched corpse
Read Magic (D0 Divi): Self reads magical writing for 160 min
Remove Blindness/Deafness (Healer3 Conj): Heals touched of blindness or deafness
Remove Disease (Healer3 Conj): Cures touched of all diseases
Restoration (Healer4 Conj): Dispels magical ability harm from touched and heals all temporary ability damage, restores 1 drained ability, removes fatigue or exhaustion and temporary negative levels, and restores 1 drained level
Screen (Ch8 Illu): R65' Illusion hides 16 30' cu from vision and scrying (DC 17 Will disbelieve) for 1 dy
Symbol Of Sleep (Ch5 Ench): R60' Rune sleeps 10 HD or less for 3d6x10 min (DC 14 Will neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 160 min
Ventriloquism (Ch1 Illu): R65' Self's voice moves for 16 min (DC 10 Will disbelieve)
Virtue (D0 Tran): Touched gains +1 temporary HP for 1 min
